Package com.mineinjava.quail.util.geometry

Class Vec2d

java.lang.Object
com.mineinjava.quail.util.geometry.Vec2d
public class Vec2d extends Object
Represents a two-dimensional vector.

  • Constructor Details

    • Vec2d

      public Vec2d()
      Creates a unit vector pointing in the positive x direction.

    • Vec2d

      public Vec2d(double length)
      Creates a vector pointing in the positive x direction with the specified magnitude.
      Parameters:
      length - - the length of the vector

    • Vec2d

      public Vec2d(double xIn, double yIn)
      Creates a vector from x and y coordinates.
      Parameters:
      xIn - - the x coordinate
      yIn - - the y coordinate

    • Vec2d

      public Vec2d(double rotation, boolean isDegrees)
      Creates a unit vector from a rotation.
      Parameters:
      rotation - - the angle of rotation (positive x is 0°)
      isDegrees - - whether or not the passed rotation is in degrees or radians

    • Vec2d

      public Vec2d(double rotation, double length, boolean isDegrees)
      Creates a vector from a rotation with a specified magnitude.
      Parameters:
      rotation - - the angle of rotation (positive x is 0°)
      length - - the length of the vector
      isDegrees - - whether or not the passed rotation is in degrees or radians

    • Vec2d

      public Vec2d(double[] coords)
      Creates a vector from an array of coordinates.
      Parameters:
      coords - - the array of coordinates

    • normalize

      public Vec2d normalize()
      Normalizes the vector.
      Returns:
      A normalized version of this vector.

    • angleSimilarity

      public double angleSimilarity(Vec2d other)
      Cosine squared of half the angle between two vectors

    • scale

      public Vec2d scale(double scale)
      Scales the vector.
      Parameters:
      scale -
      Returns:
      A scaled version of the vector

    • getLength

      public double getLength()
      Calculates the length of the vector by using the pythagorean theorem.
      Returns:
      The vector's length.

    • getLengthSquared

      public double getLengthSquared()
      Calculates the squared length of the vector. Faster than getLength()
      Returns:
      The squared length of the vector.

      Parameters:
      vec - - the vector to add
      Returns:
      The resulting vector after the addition.

      Subtracts the vector by the passed in vector.
      Parameters:
      vecX - - the vector's x coordinate
      vecY - - the vector's y coordinate
      Returns:
      The resulting vector after the subtraction.

    • getAngle

      public double getAngle()
      Calculates the vector's rotation, with 0° being the positive x direction.
      Returns:
      The vector's rotation in radians. Returns NaN if the vector is zero.

    • distanceTo

      public double distanceTo(Vec2d vec)
      Calculates the smallest angle to the passed vector.
      Parameters:
      vec - - the vector to compare to
      Returns:
      The smallest angular distance between the two vectors in Radians.

    • rotate

      public Vec2d rotate(double rotation, boolean isDegrees)
      Rotates the vector by the passed amount. Positive rotation is counterclockwise, and negative rotation is clockwise.
      Parameters:
      rotation - - the angle to rotate
      isDegrees - - whether or not the passed rotation is in degrees or radians
      Returns:
      The rotated vector.

    • dot

      public double dot(Vec2d vec)
      Performs a dot product with the passed vector.
      Parameters:
      vec - - the vector to dot with
      Returns:
      The dot product.
